籤詩版本二:
Uvuyo oluphambi kwam alulovuyo, kwaye alukho ukonwaba ngamaxesha engozi.
Kutheni le nto kuyimfuneko ukusika inyama ukuze kulungiswe izilonda?Kungcono ukulinda ixesha uze unyange izilonda → ziba zizilonda.
詩意:
Le hexagram ifana nokusika inyama ibe zizilonda.
Zonke izinto kufuneka zenziwe ngexesha elifanelekileyo.
解曰: Ukuba uyakwazi ukuyeka, yima. Yazi indlela yokuzixolela. Zisike eyakhe inyama. Intlungu ngokubanzi.
籤詩故事一:
◇I-Sun Bin ibanjiwe kwaye iPang Juan ibanjiwe
Ngexesha leXesha lokulwa, uSun Bin wayeyinzalelwane yaseQi. UPang Juan wayeyinzalelwane yaseWei. Wayekwanqula uGu Guzi njengomfundisi-ntsapho wakhe.
U-Sun Bin wayengcono ekufundeni kunoPang Juan.Xa u-Pang Juan wayeyinjengele kwiphondo lase-Wei, wayesilwa no-Sun Bin kwidabi lengqondo kwaye wamthiya u-Sun Bin xa elahlekelwa.
Wasebenzisa iqhinga lokumnqumla iinyawo uSun Bin, ethubeni uSun Bin wazenza ophambeneyo wakwazi ukubaleka.
UKumkani u-Wei waseQi wasebenzisa u-Sun Bin njengomcebisi wakhe wezempi. Khokela amajoni ukuba ahlasele i-Wei.
U-Sun Bin wasebenzisa indlela yokwenza ngathi ukunciphisa amandla otshaba kunye nokwandisa imikhosi yakhe ngokufihlakeleyo. Wamkhohlisa uPang Juan waza wamsukela kwiMaling Road. Wadutyulwa wafa lijoni elalimlalele ngomthi onqamlezileyo.
聖意: Ukungakhululeki ekhaya, ukuthetha, ukufuna ubutyebi, ishishini elingathandekiyo, umtshato wesikhohlakali awuhlali ixesha elide, Liujia, abantu abavala amasimi, umonakalo wesilika, umonakalo wemfuyo emithandathu, ukukhangela abantu, amatyala angekho esidlangalaleni, ilahleko, ukufuduka, ukugcinwa, ukulahleka. impahla, kunzima ukuyifumana, ukugula, amangcwaba aphindaphindiweyo entabeni, engathandekiyo
古人: I-Sun Bin ibanjwe kwaye i-Pang Juan ibanjwe
